file_content.text: Why are we back here? We don't have the credits yet.
Yeah, yeah. I'll get Tivva. Tivva!
Here is your money.
Crystal?
Yes, cute thing? You looking for work?
Do you have a girl named Tivva working here?
We're looking for her sister.
I would look fantastic in your outfit. Am I hired?
[Joke] Actually, I was.
We're really not that kind of place. Tried it, didn't work out.
Men come here looking for something exotic. How about a Sith Lord on staff?
[Joke] Actually, I was.
Hmm. Actually with your coloring...
That's not a bad idea, actually. Sense of danger...
She could stand to make a few credits on the side. Pull her weight.
Yes. Give Vette a job.
Cute sells. Can't deny that. Let's get you out of those terrible clothes and see what we're working with.
We're not here for a job. We're looking for my sister, Tivva.
Ah. Of course. I guess everyone has somebody that loves them. Tivva!
No women, no couples. And no, I don't want to hear any argument.
Tivva?
Maybe we got the wrong Tivva. Is it a common name?
You sure it's the right girl?
Not that I know of. Never heard anyone else get called 'Tivva, Tivva, gonna squeeze ya.'
I don't think you really see your customers anymore. Look closer.
Tivva, it's your sister.
Hold on, Vette. I want to explore this rule against women. I mean we're all open minded here.
Wait, why no women?
Let's step back a second and talk about that "no couples" policy.
Wait, why no couples?
Shut up. Please? Crazy Sith Channel turned to mute?
Ce'na?
What the--you're alive?
Despite my best efforts. This is my friend. He's, um, a Sith Lord.
Despite my best efforts. This is my friend. She's, um, a Sith Lord.
Charmed. Any family of Vette's is a friend to me.
Nice to meet you.
Vette? Is that what you're calling yourself these days? Sounds like a gangster from the tech sector.
Old days, long behind me.
Is Ce'na a Twi'lek word for sister or something?
Wait, what did Tivva call you?
It's my name. Ce'na. You don't think anyone names their kid 'Vette' do you?
I'm going to need to have Jaesa start coming along to announce me.
That was a terrible intro.
Ignore him. Sith are apparently more ridiculous than you'd think.
Ignore her. She's all sorts of great and crazy.
So I'm guessing this wasn't a voluntary, uh, career move?
I've been here two years and it's killing me. I kept thinking I'd get sold again but I'm too old. Ce'na, you have to get me out of here.
Wow. Okay, big favor? Can you buy my sister's freedom?
I can pay for it.
When I get [NUMBER] credits.
I've already freed one Twi'lek slave, Vette. Earn the credits or let her work for her freedom.
Not a chance.
Yeah. I guess it is a lot to ask. Hang in there a little while? I'll figure something out.
Here's hoping, sis. You know where I'll be.
We have lonely staff. Head to the spaceport. We'll do some shopping and meet you back later.
She entertains the crew first.
Wow. Okay. That's, um, Tivva?
Don't worry, little sister. Part of the job. I'll see you in a couple hours.
Let me sample the wares. Make sure she is worth the asking price.
First she entertains me.
Please tell me this is the worst joke attempt ever.
I would never do such a thing, Vette.
Of course. Just kidding!
Uh-huh. Of course you wouldn't.
What? I was only--okay, no problem.
Not okay? Fine, fine.
Men.
So? Credits?
I want to but I don't have the money on me.
We don't have [NUMBER] credits.
I'm paying for the merchandise. It's only right I should get to test it out.
Not kidding. It's my right.
Fine, at least you'll get to be with one Twi'lek girl in your life.
I guess that's fair....Tivva?
Don't sweat it, little sister. I've seen worse. We'll be back.
Okay. Done. Now about those credits?
This should cover it. Go pay your master. You're a free woman.
Sure, here's the money.
You see why I hang out with a Sith Lord?
I see, I see. I'll be right back.
It's done! I need to get my stuff. I can never thank you enough. Ce'na, I'll be in touch soon, okay?
Make it soon! Well, that was amazing. Shall we go?
We must have spent the last of our credits shopping. I'll have to go get more.
Wait. I don't have [Number].
But we will be back as soon as we have it!
Okay. See you soon.
I decided not to buy your freedom after all. Enjoy this life.
I've changed my mind.
You are low class and a moron. You thought I'd just pay for your freedom? Never.
Fooled you, stupid.
You...I can't believe you!
It's the way of the galaxy, sis. But you know where I am now. We'll keep in touch.
Not here to just look at. You got credits?
